proj.abbi.device

Class DeviceControlActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • proj.abbi.device.DeviceControlActivity

  • public class DeviceControlActivity
extends Activity
    For a given BLE device, this Activity provides the user interface to connect, display data, and display GATT services and characteristics supported by the device. The Activity communicates with BluetoothLeService, which in turn interacts with the Bluetooth LE API.

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Create the ActionBar menu and set the visibility of the buttons depending on the current state. - If the application is in idle state - the scan button is visible - Otherwise, the stop button is available
